name: Not Drod
description:
A 19kb minigame created in one evening.

This is like DROD but with a bow.

  • The game is turn based: all enemies move only after you move
  • Spawners take a few turns to create enemies
  • You can move in the grid with [W], [A], [S], [D]
  • Rotate with [Q] and [E]
  • Wait this turn with [Enter]
  • Load your bow with [Spacebar] and show line of sight
  • Shoot with [Spacebar] after loading to kill first enemy in line of sight
  • Destroy all enemies including spawners
  • If you don't like the spawners starting positions, just reset with [0]
